summary: A cuckolded embezzler on the verge of suicide is helped by a tout, an alcoholic playwright, and a pick-up girl to reimburse the money with a gambling sting.
cast: Douglas Fairbanks Jr.|Rita Hayworth|Thomas Mitchell|John Qualen|George Watts|Ralph Theodore|Eddie Foster|Jack Roper|Constance Worth|Harry Antrim|Walter Baldwin|Richard Bond|Jack Carr|James Conaty|Frank Conlan|Jimmy Conlin|Catherine Courtney|Carmen D'Antonio|Tommy Dixon|Edward Earle|Bess Flowers|Caroline Frasher|Roger Gray|Carlton Griffin|Ben Hecht|Art Howard|Jerry Jerome|William Lally|Ethelreda Leopold|Patricia Maier|Blanche Payson|Lee Phelps|Al Rhein|Walter Sande|Cy Schindell|Harry Strang|Fred Sweeney|John Tyrrell|Billy Wayne
keywords: henchman|damsel in distress|held at gunpoint|theatre watchman|theatre prop room
